content.question: The dry garden of Ryoan-ji expresses the influence of Zen Buddhism on Japanese art during the Muromachi period in the

choices.label: foundation of its design on a mandala form intended to represent the sacred cosmic order
progression of increasingly smaller spaces intended to emphasize the sacred nature of the divine
inclusion of concentric rings in its design intended to represent the path to enlightenment
austerity of its design and materials intended to create a serene and meditative atmosphere

content.answer: austerity of its design and materials intended to create a serene and meditative atmosphere
